p: For YFP fusion constructs, the coding regions of SaTPS1 to 3 were subcloned into the pSAT6-EYFP vector using T4 ligase (Invitrogen) (Additional file 1: Table S8 and S9). All constructs were verified by DNA sequencing at BGI. The fusion constructs and m-Cherry fluorescence protein were transformed into Arabidopsis mesophyll protoplasts as described previously [ 76]. The transformed protoplasts were incubated at 22°C for 16–24 h. YFP fluorescence was observed using a confocal laser-scanning microscope (Leica TCS SP8 STED 3X, Wetzlar, Germany).
